welcome: Welcome to the IPR Quiz Platform!

quizRules.time: You have 15 minutes to complete the quiz.
quizRules.questions: The number of questions equals the total marks for this quiz.
quizRules.skip: You can skip questions if you're unsure.
quizRules.results: You can see your results after the quiz.

loginNeeded: You need to be logged in to start the quiz.
